statements: UPDATE CuisineReport SET total_sales = 1500.00, total_expenses = 1000.00, profit = 500.00 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE CuisineReport SET total_expenses = 800.50, profit = 700.00, total_sales = 1500.50 WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
UPDATE CuisineReport SET total_sales = total_sales + 5000, total_expenses = total_expenses + 2000, profit = profit + 3000 WHERE cuisine_id = 1
UPDATE CuisineReport SET total_expenses = total_expenses - 1000, total_sales = total_sales + 3000 WHERE cuisine_id = 2
UPDATE Cuisines SET expenses = 5000 WHERE cuisine_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Reports SET profitability = 0.75, date = '2022-10-15' WHERE report_id = '222e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE CuisineSales SET total_sales = 12000.50 WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
UPDATE CuisineExpenses SET ingredient_cost = 5000.00, labor_cost = 3000.00, rent_cost = 2000.00 WHERE cuisine_id = 5;
UPDATE CuisineSales SET total_sales = total_sales + 500.00 WHERE cuisine_id = 1 AND year = 2021;
UPDATE CuisineExpenses SET ingredient_cost = 7500.00, labor_cost = 4000.00, rent_cost = 2000.00 WHERE cuisine_id = 2 AND year = 2020;
UPDATE Sales SET sale_amount = 1500.75, cuisine_type = 'Italian' WHERE sale_id = 101;
UPDATE CuisineProfitability SET total_sales = 20000.00, net_profit = 1500.50 WHERE cuisine_id = 201;
UPDATE Sales SET sale_amount = 1500.50, cuisine_type = 'Italian' WHERE sale_id = 101;
UPDATE CuisineProfitability SET total_expenses = 800.25, net_profit = total_sales - 800.25 WHERE cuisine_id = 201;
UPDATE cuisine_sales SET total_sales = 5000.00 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE cuisine_profit SET net_profit = 3000.00, profit_date = '2023-10-15' WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
UPDATE cuisine_sales SET total_sales = total_sales + 1000 WHERE cuisine_id = 1;
UPDATE cuisine_expenses SET expense_amount = expense_amount - 500 WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
